verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֭וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for [it is] good זַמְּרָ֣ה <S%H2167><s%> to sing praises אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> unto our God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָ֝עִים <S%H5273><s%> for [it is] pleasant נָאוָ֥ה <S%H5000><s%> is comely תְהִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8416><s%> [and] praise

בּוֹנֵ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> doth build up יְרוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD נִדְחֵ֖י <S%H1760><s%> the outcasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יְכַנֵּֽס׃ <S%H3664><s%> he gathereth together
הָ֭רֹפֵא <S%H7495><s%> He healeth לִשְׁב֣וּרֵי <S%H7665><s%> the broken לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> in heart וּ֝מְחַבֵּ֗שׁ <S%H2280><s%> and bindeth up לְעַצְּבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H6094><s%> their wounds

מוֹנֶ֣ה <S%H4487><s%> He telleth מִ֭סְפָּר <S%H4557><s%> the number לַכּוֹכָבִ֑ים <S%H3556><s%> of the stars לְ֝כֻלָּ֗ם <S%H3605><s%> to all שֵׁמ֥וֹת <S%H8034><s%> them all by [their] names יִקְרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> he calleth

גָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> Great אֲדוֹנֵ֣ינוּ <S%H113><s%> [is] our Lord וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> and of great כֹּ֑חַ <S%H3581><s%> power לִ֝תְבוּנָת֗וֹ <S%H8394><s%> his understanding אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else מִסְפָּֽר׃ <S%H4557><s%> [is] infinite

מְעוֹדֵ֣ד <S%H5749><s%> lifteth up עֲנָוִ֣ים <S%H6035><s%> the meek יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מַשְׁפִּ֖יל <S%H8213><s%> down רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> the wicked עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> eternity אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> to the ground

עֱנ֣וּ <S%H6030><s%> Sing לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בְּתוֹדָ֑ה <S%H8426><s%> with thanksgiving זַמְּר֖וּ <S%H2167><s%> sing praise לֵאלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <S%H430><s%> unto our God בְכִנּֽוֹר׃ <S%H3658><s%> upon the harp

הַֽמְכַסֶּ֬ה <S%H3680><s%> Who covereth שָׁמַ֨יִם ׀ <S%H8064><s%> the heaven בְּעָבִ֗ים <S%H5645><s%> with clouds הַמֵּכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> who prepareth לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> for the earth מָטָ֑ר <S%H4306><s%> rain הַמַּצְמִ֖יחַ <S%H6779><s%> to grow הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains חָצִֽיר׃ <S%H2682><s%> who maketh grass

נוֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> He giveth לִבְהֵמָ֣ה <S%H929><s%> to the beast לַחְמָ֑הּ <S%H3899><s%> his food לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> [and] to the young עֹ֝רֵ֗ב <S%H6158><s%> ravens אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יִקְרָֽאוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> which cry

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not בִגְבוּרַ֣ת <S%H1369><s%> not in the strength הַסּ֣וּס <S%H5483><s%> of the horse יֶחְפָּ֑ץ <S%H2654><s%> He delighteth לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not בְשׁוֹקֵ֖י <S%H7785><s%> in the legs הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of a man יִרְצֶֽה׃ <S%H7521><s%> he taketh not pleasure

רוֹצֶ֣ה <S%H7521><s%> taketh pleasure יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרֵאָ֑יו <S%H3373><s%> in them that fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמְיַחֲלִ֥ים <S%H3176><s%> him in those that hope לְחַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> in his mercy

שַׁבְּחִ֣י <S%H7623><s%> Praise יְ֭רוּשָׁלִַם <S%H3389><s%> O Jerusalem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַֽלְלִ֖י <S%H1984><s%> praise אֱלֹהַ֣יִךְ <S%H430><s%> thy God צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> O Zion

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חִ֭זַּק <S%H2388><s%> For he hath strengthened בְּרִיחֵ֣י <S%H1280><s%> the bars שְׁעָרָ֑יִךְ <S%H8179><s%> of thy gates בֵּרַ֖ךְ <S%H1288><s%> he hath blessed בָּנַ֣יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> thy children בְּקִרְבֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H7130><s%> within

הַשָּׂם־ <S%H7760><s%> He maketh גְּבוּלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1366><s%> [in] thy borders שָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace חֵ֥לֶב <S%H2459><s%> thee with the finest חִ֝טִּ֗ים <S%H2406><s%> of the wheat יַשְׂבִּיעֵֽךְ׃ <S%H7646><s%> [and] filleth

הַשֹּׁלֵ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> He sendeth forth אִמְרָת֣וֹ <S%H565><s%> his commandment אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [upon] earth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> very מְ֝הֵרָ֗ה <S%H4120><s%> very swiftly יָר֥וּץ <S%H7323><s%> runneth דְּבָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1697><s%> his word

הַנֹּתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> He giveth שֶׁ֣לֶג <S%H7950><s%> snow כַּצָּ֑מֶר <S%H6785><s%> like wool כְּ֝פ֗וֹר <S%H3713><s%> the hoarfrost כָּאֵ֥פֶר <S%H665><s%> like ashes יְפַזֵּֽר׃ <S%H6340><s%> he scattereth

מַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <S%H7993><s%> He casteth forth קַֽרְח֣וֹ <S%H7140><s%> his ice כְפִתִּ֑ים <S%H6595><s%> like morsels לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before קָ֝רָת֗וֹ <S%H7135><s%> cold מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who יַעֲמֹֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> who can stand

יִשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> He sendeth out דְּבָר֣וֹ <S%H1697><s%> his word וְיַמְסֵ֑ם <S%H4529><s%> and melteth יַשֵּׁ֥ב <S%H5380><s%> to blow ר֝וּח֗וֹ <S%H7307><s%> them he causeth his wind יִזְּלוּ־ <S%H5140><s%> flow מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> [and] the waters

מַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> He sheweth [דְּבָרֹו כ] (דְּבָרָ֣יו <S%H1697><s%> act ק) לְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob חֻקָּ֥יו <S%H2706><s%> his statutes וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטָ֗יו <S%H4941><s%> and his judgments לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> unto Israel

לֹ֘א <S%H3808><s%> has not עָ֤שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> He hath not dealt כֵ֨ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> thus לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any גּ֗וֹי <S%H1471><s%> so with any nation וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֥ים <S%H4941><s%> and [as for his] judgments בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> have not יְדָע֗וּם <S%H3045><s%> they have not known הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> them Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD
